details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.1.12 Permissions - UR3 and DocMDP
details.description: No keys other than UR3 and DocMDP shall be present in a permissions dictionary (ISO 32000-1:2008, 12.8.4, Table 258).

rule.description: No keys other than UR3 and DocMDP shall be present in a permissions dictionary (ISO 32000-1:2008, 12.8.4, Table 258).

error.message: The document permissions dictionary contains key(s) %1 other than UR3 and DocMDP
